quest.name: One Short Day on Emerald Avenue
journal:
The royal seneschal is eager to see more floral crowns on the heads of Little Ladies' Day celebrants.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

In the name of letting no princess go uncrowned, the royal seneschal divides his current stock of daisy crowns with you─though he is running low, and hopes to receive more from his staff shortly. He advises that you stand under a peach tree by the Gate of Nald and keep watch for any would-be princesses or seneschals in the meantime.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Your diligent scanning of Emerald Avenue soon rewards you with a fateful encounter─and a story to tell the royal seneschal. Once again, Aldiytha's plan has succeeded in making Ul'dah a brighter place this Little Ladies' Day.

You share your tale with the royal seneschal, who promises to see it relayed to Aldiytha. Of course, there are still many whose smiles may shine under a crown of daisies, should you be in the mood to continue spreading joy throughout the city.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: If you have the time, I could certainly use more assistance in presenting our flower crowns to those on Emerald Avenue. As I mentioned, it is at the center of our Little Ladies' Day celebration, and nary a moment passes without a would-be princess or seneschal walking by!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: I will divide my remaining stock with you─please wait by yonder peach tree and offer crowns to any potential celebrants whom I have missed. My staff is weaving more as we speak, so return to me when you need to resupply!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: I can scarce remember a more hectic Little Ladies' Day─but the smiles of newly crowned princesses and their seneschals make all of our efforts worthwhile, don't you agree?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Hey, it's Forename!

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: We're here on Ironworks business─visiting the Miners' Guild to inquire about supplies and whatnot─but we hardly expected to see you here! What brings you to Ul'dah?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Flower crowns for Little Ladies' Day? What a nice idea!

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Indeed it is! I'll take one, if you don't mind.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Er...if you say so. I'm not sure it'll match your goggles, though.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: I'm not going to wear it! It'd make a nice decoration for our little corner of Rhalgr's Reach, is all.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: We've been so harried lately, what with saving the world from Omega, sorting all the data, Cid's emotional issues... A floral decoration will bring some much-needed tranquility to the place.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: That may be a bit much for one ring of daisies to handle. I'd rather give it to Tataru─I think it'd bring out the pink in her eyes. She'd like it, wouldn't she?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Thank you kindly. It's so colorful... I bet Alpha would love it, were he here. I hope he's learned about Little Ladies' Day, wherever he may be.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I bet he has─and all sorts of other things besides! Most of this world is new to him, after all. He's probably having a wonderful time, so we shouldn't...we shouldn't...

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Waaah! I miss Alphaaa!

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: Why, how nice it is to see you, Forename! 'Tis I, your favorite common merchant's daughter, come to enjoy the Little Ladies' Day celebration.

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: Well met, adventurer. I am Lilira─no one of note, I fear. Merely another merchant's daughter.

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: Oho, is that a flower crown I spy? How lovely! Could I perchance trouble you for one?

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Lady Lilira, do you not think that a crown will cause you to, er...stand out overmuch?

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: Not at all! This is a day on which all little ladies are as princesses, is it not? Or do you believe that a crown will not suit one such as I?

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: M-My lady, that was hardly my intention...

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: Hahaha! I jest, I jest! I well understood your meaning.

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: Yet my point stands─as a little lady, it is fitting that I have a crown. And I would quite like one, besides.

dialogue.name: NANAMOULNAMO
dialogue.text: I expect that everyone at home will be surprised─it has been quite some time since I was last a princess. Hmm, or shall I play the role of Sultan Baldric instead? “My lady, I am your royal seneschal!”

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I only ask that you avoid any jests that may alarm your other attendants. I nearly perished on the spot!

dialogue.name: YELLOWMOON
dialogue.text: <gasp> Could it be? The garland spoken of in faerie tales and romances... The accessory of my childhood dreams... A flower crown!?

dialogue.name: YELLOWMOON
dialogue.text: How wonderful! It will perfectly suit a fair maiden such as I, don't you agree? Oh, I can hardly wait to show Bitter Snow─he'll fall in love with me all over again!

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: If it isn't Yellow Moon! I see you're enjoying your flower crown. We picked ours up from the royal seneschal just a moment ago. Aren't they cute?

dialogue.name: YELLOWMOON
dialogue.text: Adalberta! You look positively precious!

dialogue.name: YELLOWMOON
dialogue.text: And you, Mylla, are stunning! Somehow your steely gaze makes your crown all the lovelier. You should decorate your hair more often!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I feel utterly ridiculous. But Adalberta insists I wear the thing...

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Come now, there's no use pretending─you know you like it. And you'll be turning heads for the rest of the day. One head in particular, I'm su─

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Not. Another. Word. Do you hear me?

dialogue.name: YELLOWMOON
dialogue.text: Now, now, no murder on Little Ladies' Day! It's not ladylike!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Oh, I would never harm Adalberta─she's one of my oldest and dearest friends. Even if she is constantly pestering me.

dialogue.name: ADALBERTA
dialogue.text: Well, someone has to do it!

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: ...Is that you, my loyal assistant? Why are you standing about gormlessly in the middle of town?

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Why do your eyes fixate on me so? If you're in need of some piddling potion or other, direct your vacuous gaze at some other alchemist. My attentions are occupied by more important matters.

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: A flower crown? How utterly banal.

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Though, were one to apply an admixture of the appropriate viscosity and translucence, it may be possible to preserve its beauty evermore, thereby defying principles that have heretofore been presumed unyielding... Perhaps I do require one after all.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Hm hm hm... Guildmaster Redolent Rose, if I'm not mistaken. What brings you here?

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Ah, a master of the Thaumaturges' Guild! I recall the eyepatch, so you must be Coco...er...

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Cocobuki, yes.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: That was it! As to your question, I've come to evaluate the fashions of the day. And by “evaluate” I simply mean “observe,” of course. I'm not keeping score. Who would do that? Hahaha... Anyway, the flower crowns certainly are charming, are they not?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Charming...yes. Such an embellishment would ill suit me. Busi, on the other hand...

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: One crown, my good womanman!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: A pleasing headpiece, and perhaps suitable for later use in alchemic solutions. Busi will be delighted.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: His name may be impossible to remember, but he's unmistakably the eldest brother. I do hope his siblings know how much he cares.

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Forename! Are you helping the royal seneschal this year? How kind of you!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Hello there, adventurer! Thank you for helping the royal seneschal─volunteers like you make Little Ladies' Day an event I look forward to year after year!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Oho, if it isn't Forename! And Mistress Serendipity, shimmering with youth!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: If it isn't Mistress Serendipity, shimmering with youth!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: I'm...pretty sure that's just light reflecting off of my accessories. But what brings you here, Master Hamon?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hamon Holyfist would never forgo a chance to celebrate with the ladies, ohohoho! Keeps me vigorous.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: And what about you, Mistress Serendipity? Do you require a seneschal for the day? I would be at your beck and call─managing your mammets, polishing your hammers, delivering righteous blows to the teeth of persistent suitors...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Oh, my! That's very...specific of you, but I couldn't ask you to do that! And Chuchuto would probably be less than pleased to find you eschewing your own guild duties in favor of mine.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Oh, woe is me! Were I twenty─actually, better make that forty─years younger...

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: If you'd like to celebrate with someone, why not take one of these flower crowns to Chuchuto and tell her how much you appreciate her? I'm sure she'd be delighted to have your help with some of the more tedious guild work for the day, at the very least. Don't you agree?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Make a princess of my ever-devoted disciple, eh? Well, she certainly deserves it!

dialogue.name: POPOKKULI
dialogue.text: Hm? You, you're that adventurer─Forename! What are you up to?

dialogue.name: POPOKKULI
dialogue.text: Hm, you have the look of an adventurer. If you're looking for beasts to slay, you're in the wrong place, I'm afraid.

dialogue.name: SESERUKKA
dialogue.text: Giving out crowns for Little Ladies' Day? Interesting! Shall we take one to Nenekko?

dialogue.name: POPOKKULI
dialogue.text: Not a bad idea! She always did love it when we read the Legend of the Lost Lady to her as a child.

dialogue.name: POPOKKULI
dialogue.text: She's been so immersed in her research lately that she's like to have forgotten about Little Ladies' Day altogether, which means it'll be a pleasant surprise!

dialogue.name: GREINFARR
dialogue.text: Heh. She's a lucky girl, to have you two watching over her.

dialogue.name: SESERUKKA
dialogue.text: While we're on the subject, Greinfarr, isn't there anyone you would want to give one of these crowns to?

dialogue.name: GREINFARR
dialogue.text: Wh─ No! Of course not. I am far too busy training to even think of such things.

dialogue.name: GREINFARR
dialogue.text: In fact, the Bronze Bull hears the call of the arena right now! Farewell!

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Why, it's Forename! I was hoping I might find our biggest fan amongst the princessesseneschals, and here you are!

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: It's wonderful to see you again! I was so worried that we wouldn't meet this year.

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: A happy coincidence indeed. And before you ask─because I know you will─though our performances aren't the main event this year, our stage career is still going strong. So I had better not see you fretting when you should be celebrating!

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Hello there, adventurer─I don't believe we've met. I'm Ulala, beloved star of the Songbirds and soon-to-be number one songstress in all of Eorzea!

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: I am Narumi. Though I lack Ulala's boldness, I too believe that our ensemble can reach the realm through our performances. I hone my voice night and day to make certain that when we do, I can stand proudly before our audience and lift their hearts with my song.

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: And I'm Masha Mhakaracca─you can call me Masha. My voice may not be as sweet as Narumi's, but I more than make up for that with my dancing. I live to inspire our fans to move with the music!

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: So, are you waiting for your seneschal to come? Or maybe your princessprincess to come? Or maybe your seneschal?

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: Oh, I adore flower crowns! May we each have one?

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Come to think of it, this seems like the perfect opportunity for one of our signature friendly competitions. Shall we ask Forename to judge who wears her crown best?

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Oh, absolutely! It never hurts to gauge public opinion─and I'm confident that shehe will make the objectively correct choice.

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: No matter how many times we do this, I can't help but feel nervous! But, well...Forename, what do you think? Who does the crown best suit?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Who will you choose?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Ulala─she's so cute I could die.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Narumi─the crown befits one gentle of spirit.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Masha─poised and graceful, as a princess should be.

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: Ha, I knew you would choose me! I am no less pleased to hear it, though. Thank you!

dialogue.name: ULALA
dialogue.text: The Songbirds will continue to flutter into hearts across Eorzea, so spare a thought for us as you wander far and wide. Until we meet again!

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: M-Me? I'm honored─thank you! I will remember your words, and I am certain they shall help me find my voice in times of need.

dialogue.name: NARUMI
dialogue.text: I know not where or when it might be, but I look forward to the next time we meet!

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Who, me? I realize that it was I who proposed the contest, but I wasn't expecting to receive such a compliment. Thank you!

dialogue.name: MASHAMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: This has been great fun─I hope we'll meet again soon. And wherever you go, remember that the Songbirds are singing for you!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Ah, you have returned. How did you fare?

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: What a charming tale! We shall have to relay it to Miss Aldiytha─she will be delighted to know that her crowns are the source of such happiness.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: For my part, I appreciate your continued assistance. Needless to say, you will always be welcome to join me in acting as seneschal to the little ladies of Ul'dah!
